title: Shaolin Wheel of Life The Masters Edition 2 DVD Set DVDRip MP4
description:
The Masters Edition not only contains the amazing original show but is packed with truly exceptional additional footage. We travel to the remote interior of China to the actual Shaolin Temple where the Grand masters perform spectacular new feats of breathtaking Kung-Fu. Beautifully filmed at the spiritual home of Kung-Fu these scenes have rarely been seen by Western eyes.

The special edition also includes previously unreleased footage from the original live show which features legendary Buddhist monks. With narration by John Hurt, this magical production takes you closer than the best seats in the house to witness incredible theatrical performances.

Watch in amazement as the monks are lifted aloft on sharpened spears, break iron bars on their heads, smash concrete blocks whilst lying between beds of nails and sword, perform handstands on two fingers and splinter wooden staves against their bodies.

Video; x264; 1814 kbps; 25.000 fps
Audio; aac; 160 kbps; 2 ch; 48.0 Khz

Shaolin Wheel of Life Live Show 83 min (708*576; 16:9)
Enter the Shaolin The Making of Wheel of Life 46 min (708*576; 4:3)
Masters of Kung Fu Documentary 43 min (720*572; 16:9)

Subtitles: English (hard-subbed for non-English segments only)
